parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE. The post contains "CMF: 11240014" at the end, clearly indicating it's electoral propaganda material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE. The post explicitly mentions "Marian Dumitru" and his affiliation with AUR (Alianța pentru Unirea Românilor), along with his position as a Senator.  This directly refers to a candidate participating in the elections, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE.  The post is a paid Facebook advertisement targeting Calarasi County, aiming to reach a wide audience. The phrase "Dragi călărășeni" (Dear people of Calarasi) further reinforces this.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE. The clear call to action "Votați AUR – viitorul aparține celor curajoși!" (Vote AUR – the future belongs to the brave!) explicitly aims to influence voters to choose AUR. This directly serves an electoral objective, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE. The content lacks journalistic objectivity. It's a promotional piece advocating for a specific candidate and party, not an unbiased news report or analysis.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE. The post doesn't express a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, exceeding the boundaries of personal expression.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>578490801208263</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, identified by ad_archive_id 578490801208263, fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, Art 36 (7). It explicitly mentions a candidate (Marian Dumitru), is clearly intended for a wide audience (paid Facebook ad targeting Calarasi County), and has the explicit objective of influencing the vote in favor of AUR. The presence of a CMF number further confirms its nature as electoral propaganda.  The post's content goes beyond simple information; it's a direct appeal for votes.  The end date of the ad (1732953600) needs to be checked against the official end date of the electoral campaign to determine if it violates Article 98 t) regarding the continuation of electoral propaganda after its conclusion.  If the campaign has ended, this post is a clear violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>MARIAN DUMITRU</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>AUR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Societatea Calarasi Hexel Press SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei reclame electorale pe Facebook (ID postare: 578490801208263) care promovează candidatul Marian Dumitru de la AUR, cu mesajul explicit „Votați AUR – viitorul aparține celor curajoși!”, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea AUR, fapt ce constituie propagandă electorală după încheierea campaniei electorale, conform Legii nr. 334/2006, art. 36 (7), și prezența CMF-ului 11240014.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
